about.title: About me:
about.second-part-first-paragraph: , a junior Web Developer currently studying at the WildCodeSchool in Lyon.
about.second-part-second-paragraph: but I'm planning on learning more languages & technologies such as React and NodeJS.
about.first-part-third-paragraph: I also fell in love with
about.second-part-third-paragraph: developement and I'm trying my best to help the community !

P1.name: Ohto
P1.desc1: Angular app using AniList's API to offer a random anime/manga based on the user's filters.
P1.desc2: Made alone during my free time.

P2.name: SpaceTools
P2.desc1: Hackathon web app providing an entertainment toolbox for robots in space. Winning project
P2.desc2: Made in 24h by a 5 members team.

P3.name: Direct Feminin
P3.desc1: Student project providing standing, calendar and direct matches for women sport.
P3.desc2: Made in 4 weeks by a 5 members team.

P4.desc1: Collection of code snippets (MDN) made using HTML/CSS/vanilla JS
P4.desc2: Made in 2 weeks by a 3 members team.

P5.name: Aurinko
P5.desc1: Small weather app made with Angular and OpenWeather's api to learn more about Angular.
P5.desc2: Made alone during my free time.
